def fibonacci(n):
    """Return the nth Fibonacci number."""
    return fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)
@functools.lru_cache(maxsize=None)
def cached_fibonacci(n):
    """Return the nth Fibonacci number, with caching."""
    return fibonacci(n)
